website_summaries.verdict: This target lets you practice for real-life hunting situations rather than shooting a bag.
pros: Lets you practice on all four sides of the buck
Polyfusion technology fuses the internal layers to the inner target wall for uniform layer compression and easy arrow removal
Four-sided replaceable core measures 11" x 11" x 11"
Five times the shooting surface of comparable 3-D deer targets
Allows for more than 1,000 practice shots
Stops broadhead and field tip arrows
cons: You will need to engage the adjustable base by turning it until it fits the holes in the bottom of the legs

customer_reviews.title: Fun until it crumbled
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so far. I will post an update when I have to rotate the foam cube. ***UPDATE*** As stated above, this product was everything I hoped it would be, UNTIL, I pulled out my final shot group from dead center mass and the front leg fitting broke. Where the foam thigh connects to the plastic leg just ripped right off. Definitely not the quality you would expect from a reputable company and the price I paid for the target. I will update again if the company makes it right. Also, in December the product was $145. Now it's listed for $115. I'm sure I'm not the only one having issues with their Glendel buck.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. This was daddy's big gift
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broke ear, heart and lungs jammed in upside down, and the leg stakes are stuck inside the legs with no way to get them out. Box was obviously retapped as a previous return. Too late to get another one here for Christmas. Very disappointed. This was daddy's big gift. field logic seller
customer_reviews.author: Flip Flop Life

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Product came in the time that was promised. Shot a few rounds of arrows into it but when I went to change the insert part of the structure itself broke. Now I have to use Gorilla tape to keep it together. Paid this much money for something which broke in a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome target!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sweet target so far. I've put at least 300 shots into it with no problems. Some people criticized the length of the posts that come with it, but there are two holes in the feet. If you put the posts in the smaller holes, it seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: After buying this as a gift and seeing how poorly its made, I would not purchase again there is no way of returning the piece thats defected they want the whole target returned ,the box was opened and retaped upon arrival ,this will not last very long sad to say buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Adam King

customer_reviews.title: Deers parts barely fit together
customer_reviews.text: The legs are supposed to fit on like puzzle pieces but the body's foam seems too thick to slide the legs into the correct places, however I'm guessing that is to create a strong fitment. Antlers are also too big for the head and seems unrealistic as they touch tips when both are inserted. The first day I used it I was lazy and left it up overnight and a buck came by and did it's thing. I am impressed however that it was still standing the next day. The decoy is still in usable condition but it's pretty scarred both externally and mentally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He said it is sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: I am not a hunter, nor do I shoot a bow. I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. He has used it several times over the past month and really likes it so far. He said it is sturdy and works well. He likes that the insert is replaceable so once this one wears out we can buy the new insert without having to replace the entire target.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Do Not use with Crossbow Bolts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this target to use with my Ravin R29 crossbow bolt (430 FPS) and my first three shot at 55 yards away almost buried the bolts. I ruined one arrow fletching trying to remove the bolts from the kill zone. I literally laid the target on the ground, stood on it (I'm 165 lbs) to pull the bolts out and I couldn't budge the bolts. Ended up removing field tips, spraying bolt with WD40, then with a hammer and a block of wood, freed the bolt a little bit from the back side until i could pull the bolt out using all my strength. I didn't think I was going to get the bolts out...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The negative reviews almost made me not purchase. However I did anyways and I’m I’m glad that I did. My fiancé has love shooting this. It’s the perfect size pretty realistic and sturdy. Funny story he actually tricked a friend into think it was a real deer and he actually shot at it. We bought the stand for it too and very sturdy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: morgan adams

customer_reviews.title: Foam body falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the foam that joints the back strap to the hind quarters was ripped. The foam body of the target is very brittle and disappointing. With a few weeks of moderate use now the holding points on either side of the center block are failing. I have put a stick behind the block to hold it in place. Also the connection from the plastic legs to the foam is slowly failing. On the positive side the target block is great material and I can easily see it lasting many years. The arrows come out easier than a few other targets I have.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron E

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to order this target for less than the same target was being sold for at our local hunting goods store and the 2-day shipping is always a plus! It works great and is sturdy and appears to be weathering okay so far. I would recommend to any hunters who are preparing for the upcoming bow seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren St. Onge

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a bit
customer_reviews.text: All in all this is an ok target. The head broke, ears broke off and the sections aren't super tight but it gets the job done. Arrows are easy to remove and can take many arrows. We shoot it without the head on and it works fine. Could be better quality but..i think they are all about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Brzb

customer_reviews.title: Realistic size target, but construction is only fair
customer_reviews.text: The target looks great and I'd say the size of a 145lb live deer. I've shot my carbon spyder and my ghost 350 crossbow at it from 10 to 40 yards and the target handles both. The foam quality is excellent. After 200 shots total, no effect on vital zone integrity. My only complaint would be the way it's held together is fair at best. The vitals section is not very secure and I have to lean against vitals and careful pull bolts/arrows out as vital section pulls away from target easily.
customer_reviews.author: john v. wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stop my husband arrows.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new target that does not stop arrows. My husband has wanted one of these for a very long time. I finally gave in. His arrows blow right through it. We had to stack our old target behind this to stop the arrows. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best target out there at this price point
customer_reviews.text: This is the best target out there at this price point. Its a nice size, and is proportioned well. The multiple sided insert is a fantastic addition. You can pay more and get a bigger target, but all your ever shooting at is the insert. The Field Logic Big Shooter Buck is the second best because of its price. Its not as big, or well made, and only has a two sided insert, but at 33% less price, its a close second!
customer_reviews.author: buyer80

customer_reviews.title: broke in half
customer_reviews.text: the changeable insert is a good idea but above and below the insert is so thin and weak first the top broke so I went to hardware store bought glue to try and fix it but when I picked it up the bottom broke so it was broken completely in half and I threw it away and I had only used it three weeks the buck target I had before lasted three years
customer_reviews.author: bowhunter

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this target and metal stand, minus its ability to stay together. I’ve shot maybe 20 arrows at this thing and the foam in the top latch that comes down over the square target is cracked, I’m left to assume this is why after a few full metal jacket arrows the target portion is pushing out the backside of the deer.If I had the ability to return this I would, overall very dissatisfied with the quality of the target. I have a buddy that had one and his seemed to fall apart as well. I guess I will attempt to reach out to the company and see what they can do for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zak miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great until you need a new insert because you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great until you need a new insert because you have shot over 100 and 200 field points and all its sides. One side could only withstand 10-20 shots with a broadheads which leaves with 1 more side to work with. It looks awesome which earn 3 stars. Durability losses 2 star. Overall give it a 3 star for its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D target
customer_reviews.text: I've been shooting at this target for 3 weeks now and has held up great. My arrows weigh 490g and shooting from a Hoyt Helix at 70lbs. I'm not sure of exact speed but know its smoking fast for this weight arrow. The target stops them no problem even with arrow target lube. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it. He’s put about 500 arrows through so far, the arrows are starting to fairly easily go through. He does shoot pretty thin arrows. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garnett

customer_reviews.title: A decent target but the legs are fragile
customer_reviews.text: Body of the target is of reasonable quality, but legs are poorly designed - they don’t attach securely and they’re made of brittle plastic. I attempted a long shot and my aim was off (surprise) - the arrow shattered the back of the leg and a large piece broke off. Another time my father also hit the leg and achieved the same result. At this rate my buck will need wooden legs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great stopping power and easy arrow out !! A+++++
customer_reviews.text: love it have 2 !! fair price and good arrow stop and release !! I shoot a Hoyt Maxiss31 at 70lbs 320fps, and its got no problem stopping arrows from 10 yards to 70 yards its got me coverd. arrow removal is nice not a killer. they claim easy arrow removal and it lives up to it. my first year shooting at glendel and wish I had started shooting them sooner !!arrow releas is nice everywhere not just in the replaceable core but anywhere on the buck ( except the plastic legs ) I got this shot it one day and came in and orderd another one that night !! great choice will get more as $$ allows it..
customer_reviews.author: james hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and fine for field points. The legs are plastic............ not like the more expensive targets but fine for backyard shooting. I do worry about the top piece. It is pretty thin and after many shots could become weak and break leaving the target useless. But only time will tell. If you shoot a compound probably wouldn't be an issue
customer_reviews.author: ASAT is the ONLY camo!

customer_reviews.title: Overall works well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good doesn't last forever especially if you shoot often but over all pretty decent
customer_reviews.author: lynden

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING for practicing for bow hunting! It has a layout of the vital organs so you can get you general sundown when hunting actual bucks. It also has a easily replaceable chest! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Landyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality the ear cam broke which is a bummer but I just glued it back on since hopefully I won’t be hitting anywhere near the head. The insert is adjustable in different directions so it will last longer. I bought the grandstand I don’t think the posts it came with would hold it up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: What a P.O.S. i spent the money on the Glen Del due to reviews and quality of product. What i got was far from this. This has been sitting in the box since delivery due to working. I finally get a nice day to shoot and it is nearly tore in half.
customer_reviews.author: relac47

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: dont try to save money by buying this target, it will cost more when you have to replace it way to soon. what a joke the way they have the legs attached. talk about cheap. thing falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: dewey

customer_reviews.title: Missing horns,
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Xmas. Of coarse being winter he didn’t open the box until now (March). The horns for the deer are not in there. Super disappointed. Not a major deal I guess but was expecting something I didn’t get. Wish he would have opened it earlier and I could have returned.
customer_reviews.author: m melby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, holds up very well in both hot and cold weather, takes a lot of arrows without tons of wear and tear. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far
customer_reviews.text: This is a good 3D target. It has a removable “vitals” foam block and seems to be strong so far. I have only put approximately 70 arrows into it however.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pace

customer_reviews.title: Short Durability
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my son. It lasted three months before the leg foam broke off and it couldn't be used any longer. I was expecting it to last longer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pelkey Family

customer_reviews.title: great investment
customer_reviews.text: love the target and 4 sweet spots, the front leg doesn't fit quite right, but I'm not trying to shoot the leg Lesser targets are purchased at the local park with slide in sweet spots. The sweet spot costs more than this whole target
customer_reviews.author: Ken Day

customer_reviews.title: Great target
customer_reviews.text: Great quality target. Holds up in the rain and wind. We’ve left it out for months and it still looks new. We’ve shot tons of arrows at it too and it is still in tack. The sizing is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: The Buck Stops Here...with the GlenDel Buck 3d Archery Target!
customer_reviews.text: The GlenDel Buck is the perfect target. It is well made and I love the fact that the insert can be turned so that we get the most out of it before having to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Allfey

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D target but arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: The target looks great. I bought a warehouse deal and it said factory defect but the ear was broken off as well a chipped. Didnt care about the chip but it should have said broken not factory defect. I fixed it and will not return. Only reason I give it 4stars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Waffle

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Should have more surrounding support for core. It's still working but will never survive regular practice like solid designs!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Rhobert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my Husband with this life sized deer target. He was delighted! It was easy to put the legs and head in the body. He put it up and started target shooting within minutes! It’s the size of a small deer. It’s well made. And the main body has a replaceable core. He is very happy with the it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Solid target
customer_reviews.text: Well designed for the price. I like that the vitals are shown and also that you can set it up for quartering away shots. Really no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B-lo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, and falling apart after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: It stops arrows, however the insert moves when shot. The legs hardly attach to the body, and wooden dowel lock has torn, its only a matter of time before it falls apart. I would estimate 500 arrows into this target over 4 months. Poor quality, do not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Felker

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and works
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and looks awesome in the yard. Neighbors dog doesn’t like it though.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Leroy

customer_reviews.title: ... this Target for hours and it still is in great shape. We liked that the organ diagram was ...
customer_reviews.text: My family had a Sunday Funday and shot at this Target for hours and it still is in great shape. We liked that the organ diagram was not different colors so that it was more of a surprise when you went to double check were the arrows had hit.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky17340

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Core is Great
customer_reviews.text: The GlenDel buck lasted a few years, a coyote attack and some bird attacks before having to replace the core. It's like new again and will last a few more years now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome target. Very lifelike!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loves it. Great quality and it looks very real. I like seeing it out in my back yard as it looks so real.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is good target but the legs are not built very well. The body separated from the legs. Now just set it on a hay bail. It's okay for price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Missing antlers
customer_reviews.text: Received the product. It was missing both antlers. Seems to be decent quality and it's a little smaller than I expected given that it's supposed to mimic a 200 pound deer. I'm attempting to contact the company to get replacement antlers before having to return the huge box.
customer_reviews.author: Tyge Blomberg

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago have shot hundreds of arrows into it and quite a few with broadheads and insert is still in great shape! Legs are week but for me isn’t a problem
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: size and anchor
customer_reviews.text: This target is half the size of the old one I just replaced, it's the size of a German Shepard. If you have rocky soil, good luck getting the target to stand upright. Having the target be the same size as the species is important, especially when you are shooting at ranges 60+ yards. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: rob hammond

customer_reviews.title: Consider another target
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the quality, legs are very narrow and flimsy it’s hard to get it to stand up straight very cheap plastic. I will not be buying another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for not giving 5 stars is antlers didn't stay in very well and the sun seems to be rough on target body. Love that the rotational block has different options such as quartering away, and broadside. but overall very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MarvinPalarski

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I use rage broadheads and they come with a blue practice tip. They are very hard to remove from Target. Regular field tips aren't a problem. Only had for a week or so. We'll see how it holds up over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stark

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the Buck, literally.
customer_reviews.text: I use this quite often. It does well with my arrows. I haven't tried broad tips yet.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Good for practice.
customer_reviews.text: Works but some arrows are hard to pull out and it wants to come apart when u remove the hard ones.
customer_reviews.author: Chaodyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: can’t even shoot it before repairing it. Feels cheap and have low expectations after open the box. Hard to find things that’s are worth a damn these days. Save your time and money on this one. Beyond disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Hons

customer_reviews.title: Great price - Long lasting target
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat the Glendel Buck 3D archery target. Long lasting with easy arrow removal. Just make sure to purchase a stand rather than using the two metal stakes supplied with the target.
customer_reviews.author: Ros H.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift, so we haven't used yet (Minnesota is still too cold!). The product was all together and not broken. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeley

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Before it could even touch dirt the back leg broke off. Instead of going through the return or exchange process, he gorilla glued it and put two screws through it. hope this works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking target but I had it a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking target but I had it a couple of days and when I was trying to pull an arrow out I had to put my side against the target to get it out and when I pulled on the arrow the back piece split in half and the arrows come out hard
customer_reviews.author: Donald Mccormick Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Deer target
customer_reviews.text: Glen Del deer has a bigger kill zone area and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: I had read reviews that said that when it arrived it was in poor shape. I bought it anyway
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my husband for Christmas. I had read reviews that said that when it arrived it was in poor shape. I bought it anyway. When I opened the box it was poorly packed and the quality was very poor. For what I spent I was expecting to be much better. What I got was something that looked like a 5 year old made it. It's not smooth. It has rough edges and has lots of little holes in it. The quality of the Cabela's and Sportsman's brands are much better. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Turner

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Target is good but the product was shipped to me without the antlers. I was told that all of these targets were shipped out without the antlers being included due to a mistake by the manufacturer. I will not stop messaging them until the antlers get shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun P.

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money for a Rinehart target, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only shot around 60 arrows at this target and already buried an arrow to the fletching. This is not a good target. I have 1000’s of arrows in my Rinehart and purchased this to replace it, it was a mistake. I guess it might make a good decoy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Factory replacement target core, can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the old core in my glendel target. Original replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Great target
customer_reviews.text: Great target, love the different block sides for.shooting out of tree stand and quartering shots
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Product fits together very loosely. Every time you shoot the target the insert gets pushed back two inches out of the deer. Cheap made. Also the legs are hard to put on to the deer.
customer_reviews.author: Stu janssen

customer_reviews.title: BEWAR
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to break some arrows trying to pull your shots out . Don’t let the video fool you , arrow removal is the worst out of any target I have ever shot at . It’s like pulling them out of a tree!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Not pictured. NO HORNS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured at all. Didn’t even come with the horns. Was a Christmas gift and I was so embarrassed. JUST TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: pg95

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my Glen Dell Full Rut with this one. This is a good target for my Mathews bow but my Ravin Xbow goes right through it at 30 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Grogan

customer_reviews.title: ... GlenDel target a few years ago and it is great! This one is much smaller which is ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought a GlenDel target a few years ago and it is great! This one is much smaller which is ok. The problem is it is not fit for compound bows over 60 pounds. My bow is 68 pounds and my arrows go right through the target. Kind of disappointing. Otherwise it is a good target.
customer_reviews.author: razinhel

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable condition
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product In the past and been quite satisfied this time box came damaged and found product to also be busted up dented ears broken off and not in acceptable condition. I will not be recommending again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is so lifelike that the bucks come in at night and knock it over in my back yard!D
customer_reviews.author: Susan Nunnally

customer_reviews.title: so fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Started putting together had one leg ripped off before I got the head attached
customer_reviews.author: aaron ha hosking

customer_reviews.title: Good shooter
customer_reviews.text: Works great nice size looks good a bit hard to pull arrows sometimes but it's a broadhead target so no biggie I will be buying again good product
customer_reviews.author: Bowhunter2

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes and was let down!
customer_reviews.text: Not durable less then two months of use and need to tape the body together. What’s the point of having a replaceable core if it lasts longer then the rest of the deer. Very disappointed in the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I really like the different options it has on it for shooting different angles, elevated, horizontal etc. I do not know how many arrows I have shot into it but it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Product was in perfect order and was very easy to assemble. Dont recommend using the stakes that come with it. I made a stand out of unistrut and allthread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: The order was missing the legs. I had to return the whole thing in order to get the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: This was a great christmas present, but still waiting on for the rebate I mailed in.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Christmas gift, but still waiting for the rebate I mailed in.
customer_reviews.author: penny spencer

customer_reviews.title: Prompt shipping looks good at first but arrows are not as easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipping looks good at first but arrows are not as easy to remove and after about 50 shots it's starting to wear excessively
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it was damaged a little upon delivery other than that it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent target
customer_reviews.text: Have been shooting this for close to a month now both my son and I it is holding up very good I have not had to turn block yet so still have 3 more sides. Will have to start bringing it in at night as the coyote are barking at it at night..lol
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made-the foam insert was unstable and I had to hold it in when I removed my arrows, which was surprisingly hard for foam. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: jerod napier

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed... when it arrived at my house it's was missing the legs and spikes. I was looking forward to shooting this weekend. Looks like that's not happening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy with the 3d target I got
customer_reviews.text: The box showed up open and target looks like it was a returned product. Not horrible but not to happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: shawn trent

customer_reviews.title: Does great. Arrows can be a little hard to pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Does great. Arrows can be a little hard to pull out sometimes but other than that it looks good and does what is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Casey wright

customer_reviews.title: Missing ear
customer_reviews.text: My son open the box on his birthday and the ear was missing. It was not even in thr box. I had no way to contact the seller other than a review.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Price

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for Christmas and when he opened it, it was already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Noland

customer_reviews.title: BBD
customer_reviews.text: This is a great target I use the Mathews Triax!!!
customer_reviews.author: clint w davis

customer_reviews.title: Pats missing
customer_reviews.text: Came with out the legs and it was a gift
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: good target
customer_reviews.text: Nice target for the money, but I was expecting a different type of material. It does not handle shot from a treestand well.
customer_reviews.author: Itman 70

customer_reviews.title: I guess it’s a doe🙄
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t shot it yet. Just out of the box and product arrived without antlers.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Romero

customer_reviews.title: Glendale Buck 3 D Target
customer_reviews.text: Really fast shipping ordered it on Friday and got it on Sunday.Glendale buck 3D is a fantastic target,love the 4 sided shooting center core.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES MCPEAK

customer_reviews.title: Says best present ever 😊
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband for his birthday. He loves it! Says best present ever 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bell

customer_reviews.title: Target vital organs are completely backwards on every side of target
customer_reviews.text: I just unboxed my target this morning and set it up. Shot a few arrows and noticed the vital organs are printed completely backwards than their supposed to be. I would like a new replacement with the correct makeup or a full refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but.....
customer_reviews.text: Great product but was a big Christmas surprise and was delivered in a huge box with picture of the deer on the outside!!
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive for a poor quality decoy
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for a poor quality decoy. After only three shots from my bow at 60 yards the legs broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Melissa  Wells

customer_reviews.title: Happy hunter!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé was very happy with this. Holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: KristenAlexis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was a hit! Great gift As most reviews stated it was scratched in shipping but not like the first one I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great target. I can use my crossbow also with this target.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Damaged. Just want replacement part
customer_reviews.text: One part was broken... don’t want to send a big buck Target back... need replacement part
customer_reviews.author: rhhippie

product_meta.title: GlenDel Buck 3D Archery Target with Replaceable Insert Core
product_meta.description: GlenDel 3-D targets use PolyFusion Technology which results in longer target life. Because the layers are fused in place, they hold their position. Arrows find their way between layers. Fusing the internal layers to the inner target wall results in more uniform layer compression, which, in turn, means easier arrow removal. And, easier arrow removal means less shooter fatigue, which means you’ll get more and better practice!
feature_bullets: LIFE-LIKE BUCK - 3D deer target with the body size of a 200 Lb Buck. Stands 34" at shoulder height, Overall Height 56" with 150" B&C Antlers
EASY ARROW REMOVAL - Polyfusion Technology fuses the internal layers to the inner target wall resulting in uniform layer compression and ease of arrow removal
5 TIMES THE INSERT SHOOTING SURFACE - 1,000 shots of practice. More than comparable 3-D deer targets
IMPENETRABLE - Stops ALL Broadhead and Field Tip Arrows - MADE IN THE USA
LONG TARGET LIFE - 4-Sided Replaceable Insert Core measures 11" x 11" x 11" and will extend the life of the targetl (For additional Core Inserts Order: Glendel #G71100)
